body.name: MOUNTUP Height Adjustable TV Wall Mount, TV Mount for Most 26-55 Inch TVs, Gas Spring Full Motion TV Wall Mount Bracket, Swivel Tilt Single Articulating Arm, Fits Max VESA 400x400mm, 11-66 lbs MU0037
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 36 mins
features: Fully Adjustable TV Wall Mount - With a super strong pneumatic gas spring, this TV mount provides 12” of height adjustment for maximum flexibility(adjusts to the weight of the TV). Moving your TV screen up or down easily reduces strain on your neck and back for a more comfortable viewing experience.

TV Wall Mount Compatibility - The full motion TV brackets fits most 26-55 inch LED/LCD TVs and large monitors, with 11- 66 lbs. MAX loading and VESA pattern from 100x100mm to 400x400mm. This articulating television wall mount is designed for single wood studs or concrete/brick walls and is compatible with TCL, SAMSUNG, LG, VIZIO, SONY, HISENSE, and other TV brands.

Provides Perfect Viewing Angles - With a Tool-free tilting design, the TV mount can easily tilt flat or curved screen +5º/-15º to reduce glare. A 180°swivel and a smooth 23" extension can make you enjoy the television everywhere at an ergonomic sitting position.

15 Min Easy Installation - Leveling +/-3º after installation makes the installation a breeze. The package comes with step-by-step graphic installation instruction and all necessary hardware. NOTE: DO NOT install onto drywall alone. Concrete anchors will be sent per request. For any pre-purchase and installation questions, Our professional support team is available every day.

Sturdy & Durable - Constructed with heavy-duty aluminum and steel, this full motion TV mount has been strength tested based on UL standards ensure to hold the TV securely and steadily backed with 3-Year protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This one raises and lowers entire tv.
reviews.reviewText: I got this so I could store the tv low, against the wall that has a window with a beautiful view, when not watching the tv, and then raise up when we wanted to watch it. The up and down movement is strong and easy. The left/right is very easy. The looking downward and upward slant movement is semi-fixed, though, and requires a wrench tool to move or adjust. I wish that wasn’t needed, but that is not a deal breaker. I will say, EVERYTHING you need to install is included and if you can read English and take your time, this was super easy to install. There were so many details and explanations, to make it fool-proof, I was intimidated, but I guess the company needed to add those to make people actually pay attention. It is super strong and well made. I’m glad I got it and love being able to change the look of the room/view with a simple motion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This tv mount is perfect, works really well and so easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great. Needs a lot of tension reduction.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quick and works great. Used 3 for my home work desk. One 43 inch 4k monitor and two 27 4k monitor. 43 was purfect. One 27 was purfect. The other 27 was very offset on the Vesa mounts that the mounting plate stuck out a little on the top and I had to add my own holes. Needed to redece the tension 4-5 complete turns so don't be shy on this aspect until it is easy to move. Love the extra space from desk top stands on monitors. Very sturdy and lots of adjustability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Good price, sturdily built, easy to install, and small footprint. Felt very comfortable putting a 55" Amazon Fire TV on it. Adjusts easily but I took away a star because it didn't drop as much as I thought it would based on the description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile movement and secure
reviews.reviewText: This holds a TV screen that I use in my office and is placed above my desk. It's nice to pull out when using in a group setting for PowerPoint presentations and push back against the wall when not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: fit good, matched my tv perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not great quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use my living room TV so that I could swivel and adjust to point it toward the kitchen. The range of motion is not as wide as they would have you believe. The up and down is very minimal and all movement is difficult. The mount is not sturdy and my tv is well below the max limits indicated. The mount is very difficult to move at the joints and the gas spring is not holding the tv up well at all. It keeps falling ever so slowly back down. If I try to swivel it, the tv moves lower. There is even play where the tv will rotate, despite this not happening where the screws are placed to allow rotation for installation. It was just wobbly and unsteady. It did not live up to my expectations at all. Also, it's absurd to not include one tool for all adjustments. It has an included socket type tool (that was awkward to use) for the gas spring, while the tilt function and the stiff joint in the middle can't be adjusted with the same tool. I'm not sure the joint can be adjusted at all. I will be returning it to replace with the same brand in my other room. The price difference is worth getting a better mount in my opinion, as this is not easy to use and adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used a monitor arm
reviews.reviewText: This was a great alternative for use as a PC monitor arm for a larger OLED monitor adjustability on the arm up and down is great due to the size of the monitor. The lack of 90° tilt is acceptable.

I like this mount - it has up and down adjustment, tilt, angle. The up and down does take a bit of force to move and you do need to securely mount this into a wall stud with the mounting system, but I think it works well and is a great solution for the price if you need something you can move around.It's used for a TV that can be adjusted between a couch and a treadmill, so it can be moved around to be visible for someone in either location and it works quite well for that.

reviews.reviewTitle: it does what it suppose to
reviews.reviewText: Please with the outcome result however, the installation of course requires some thought and strategy. Not to mention that the system to get installed properly needs special tools and two people for the installation.However, the product is sturdy and strong to hold our big tv.
